subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Curt Schilling pitched eight innings to extend his scoreless streak to 14, and David Ortiz hit a three-run home run yesterday to lead the Boston Red Sox to an 8-0 victory against the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim.
snippet: Curt Schilling pitched eight innings to extend his scoreless streak to 14, and David Ortiz hit a three-run home run yesterday to lead the Boston Red Sox to an 8-0 victory against the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim.
